Assets:GetAssetPacks.description: Returns an array of tables containing information about all loaded Asset Packs [{Name, Path, Author, Version}, ...]

Assets:GetAnimations.description: Returns an array of strings containing all Animation Assets Keys from an AssetPack

Assets:GetMaps.description: Returns an array of strings containing all Map Assets Keys from an AssetPack

Assets:GetParticles.description: Returns an array of strings containing all Particle Assets Keys from an AssetPack

Assets:GetSounds.description: Returns an array of strings containing all Sound Assets Keys from an AssetPack

Assets:GetSkeletalMeshes.description: Returns an array of strings containing all Skeletal Mesh Assets Keys from an AssetPack

Assets:GetStaticMeshes.description: Returns an array of strings containing all Static Mesh Assets Keys from an AssetPack

Assets:GetOthers.description: Returns an array of strings containing all Other Assets Keys from an AssetPack
